body_html: @ llv22 Yes, I can confirm that pytorch was built and linked successfully on python 3.6. I basically updated my pytorch from my previous built that I had for python 2.7 using the instructions here. Hope this helps.
body_text: @ llv22 Yes, I can confirm that pytorch was built and linked successfully on python 3.6. I basically updated my pytorch from my previous built that I had for python 2.7 using the instructions here. Hope this helps.
body: @ llv22 Yes, I can confirm that pytorch was built and linked successfully on python 3.6. I basically updated my pytorch from my previous built that I had for python 2.7 using the instructions [here](http://olivernina.blogspot.com/2018/01/how-to-install-pytorch-on-mac-osx-high.html). Hope this helps.
